feed.title: Google Cloud: VPC Service Controls
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: VPC Service Controls

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • Managed Lustre
entry.summary: Managed Lustre integration is now available in preview. This allows you to integrate Managed Lustre with your existing workflows under preview terms.
entry.title: Feature: Preview support for Managed Lustre

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Privileged Access Manager
entry.summary: Privileged Access Manager integration is now generally available. This feature enhances security by providing controlled access to sensitive resources.
entry.title: Feature: Privileged Access Manager Integration Now Generally Available

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • Cloud Location Finder
entry.summary: Cloud Location Finder is now available in preview. This integration enhances your ability to manage and secure your cloud resources by providing detailed location information.
entry.title: Feature: Preview support for Cloud Location Finder

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Model Armor
entry.summary: Model Armor is now generally available, offering enhanced security for your AI models. This integration helps protect your AI deployments by providing robust security features.
entry.title: Feature: Model Armor now generally available

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • Gemini Cloud Assist
entry.summary: Gemini Cloud Assist is now available in preview. This integration enhances your cloud experience by providing intelligent assistance. Explore its capabilities and provide feedback during this early access period.
entry.title: Feature: Preview support for Gemini Cloud Assist

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Unified Maintenance
entry.summary: Unified Maintenance is now generally available. This integration simplifies the management of your services by providing a centralized approach to maintenance activities.
entry.title: Feature: Unified Maintenance GA

entry.content:
VPC Service Controls feature: The VPC Service Controls violation analyzer is generally available. You can use the violation analyzer to diagnose access denial events and generate comprehensive evaluation reports to help resolve the denial events.

The violation analyzer includes the following capabilities and updates:

  • You can use a denial event's unique ID to generate a comprehensive evaluation report.
  • Edit ingress and egress rules of a selected perimeter directly from the troubleshooting results page.
  • View log entry details associated with a denial event directly on the troubleshooting results page.
  • A few previous limitations in the violation analyzer have been removed.
  • You don't need to enable the Policy Troubleshooter API to use the violation analyzer.

For more information, see Diagnose an access denial in violation analyzer.
entry.summary: The VPC Service Controls violation analyzer is now generally available. This feature helps diagnose access denial events and generate reports for quicker resolution. It includes enhanced capabilities like generating reports using unique event IDs and editing perimeter rules directly from troubleshooting results.
entry.title: Feature: VPC Service Controls violation analyzer now generally available

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • Firebase App Hosting
entry.summary: Firebase App Hosting is now available in preview, offering enhanced integration capabilities.
entry.title: Feature: Firebase App Hosting now in Preview

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • App Design Center
entry.summary: App Design Center integration is now in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: New Integration Available

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • Unified Maintenance
entry.summary: We're excited to announce that Unified Maintenance is now available in preview. This new feature offers enhanced capabilities for managing your cloud resources.
entry.title: Feature: Unified Maintenance Support Now in Preview

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Address Validation
entry.summary: Address Validation is now generally available. This feature helps ensure the accuracy of addresses.
entry.title: Feature: Address Validation Now Generally Available

entry.content:
Updated the limitations for the following integration in the Supported products and limitations page:

  • Policy Simulator: simulations on organization and folder resources are not protected by VPC Service Controls.
entry.summary: Simulations on organization and folder resources are no longer protected by VPC Service Controls.
entry.title: Changed: Policy Simulator Limitations Updated

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Telemetry API
entry.summary: The Telemetry API has reached general availability, offering enhanced integration capabilities.
entry.title: Feature: Telemetry API Now Generally Available

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka
entry.summary: The Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is now generally available, offering a fully managed Kafka experience on Google Cloud.
entry.title: Feature: Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is now generally available

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Personalized Service Health
entry.summary: Personalized Service Health is now generally available, offering enhanced integration for better visibility into your cloud environment.
entry.title: Feature: Personalized Service Health Now Generally Available

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka
entry.summary: Preview support for Google Cloud Managed Service for Apache Kafka is now available.
entry.title: Feature: Managed Kafka Support

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Secure Web Proxy
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce the general availability of our Secure Web Proxy integration. This feature enhances your security by providing robust proxy capabilities.
entry.title: Feature: Secure Web Proxy Integration Now Generally Available

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

entry.summary: License Manager is now generally available, offering enhanced integration capabilities. This feature aims to streamline license management processes.
entry.title: Feature: License Manager Now Generally Available

General availability support for the following integration:

entry.summary: FleetPackage API now generally available.

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

entry.summary: Backup for GKE is now generally available.

entry.content:
General availability support for the following integration:

  • Eventarc Advanced
entry.summary: Eventarc now supports advanced features.
entry.title: Feature: Eventarc Advanced Support

entry.content:
VPC Service Controls feature: The VPC Service Controls violation dashboard is generally available. This dashboard provides an aggregated view of all access denials by service perimeters in your organization.

  • The following charts are added to the dashboard:
  • Violation count
  • Top violations by access policy
  • While creating a new log bucket during the dashboard setup, you can now select the region and retention period.

For more information, see Set up and view the violation dashboard.
entry.summary: VPC Service Controls violation dashboard now generally available.
entry.title: Feature: VPC Service Controls Violation Dashboard

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

entry.summary: License Manager support is now in Preview.
entry.title: Feature: Preview release of License Manager integration

entry.content:
Preview stage support for the following integration:

  • Address Validation API
  • Places (New) API
entry.summary: We are introducing preview support for Address Validation API and Places (New) API, enhancing your ability to manage security policies for these services.
entry.title: Feature: Preview Support for Address Validation and Places APIs
